programme.title: Lost In Marseille
programme.desc: Bruno, a stay-at-home father of two, gets back in touch with his masculinity when his wife is kidnapped in Marseille. Instead of the planned holiday on the Côte d'Azur, Bruno gets deeper and deeper into an intrigue, pursued by police and mafia.

programme.title: Far Frontiers
programme.desc: Maria, wife of a deputy commander of a Russian military base in Kyrgyzstan, begins a relationship with another officer. Their affair quickly spirals out of control, fatally and irreversibly changing the course of Maria's and her family's life.

programme.title: Happier Times, Grump
programme.desc: When Grump's wife dies, he sees no reason to live on. But just as his coffin is finished, Grump gets a new spark and a major secret! His teenage granddaughter is in trouble and needs help and wisdom from her grandfather, and the warmth of his fireplace.

programme.title: Ghost Town Anthology
programme.desc: Set in a small town in Quebec, the film centres on the inhabitants of the town who are struggling to cope after teenager Simon Dubé is killed in a car accident. As the family and town grieve, the residents begin to report several ghost sightings.

programme.title: Dangerous Gentlemen
programme.desc: The mountain retreat of Zakopane, 1914. Joseph Conrad and three notorious artists wake up after a crazy party with a dead man on their couch and not a clue who he is, why is he dead, and why the gendarmerie are knocking on their doors.

programme.title: For The Birds
programme.desc: Irma is a tomboy who believes independence is the only form of freedom. Then she meets Sampie, a charming rugby player with a heart of gold and oh-so-soft hands who sweeps her right off her feet to the altar, but not before she teaches him a thing or two.

programme.title: A Son
programme.desc: A family’s holiday in Tunisia ends in disaster, when their 10-year-old son Aziz is shot during a terrorist ambush. At the hospital where Aziz is in desperate need of a transplant, the family discovers a long-buried secret.

programme.title: Premiere Affaire
programme.desc: Nora, a young and an inexperienced criminal defense lawyer is charged with the case of a teenage boy accused of murdering a neighbour.

programme.title: Europa
programme.desc: Kamal has fled Iraq to try to enter "Fortress Europe". At the Turkish-Bulgarian border, local mercenaries are ruthlessly hunting down migrants. Alone in the forest, Kamal has three days to escape.

programme.title: Murders In Lorraine
programme.desc: A corpse clutching a crystal chess piece is found in an old fortress. Lieutenant Muller and a young female intern work on the case. Much to his horror, the clues lead him to his family-owned crystal factory – a legacy he abandoned for his police dream.

programme.title: Lost In Marseille
programme.desc: Bruno, a stay-at-home father of two, gets back in touch with his masculinity when his wife is kidnapped in Marseille. Instead of the planned holiday on the Côte d'Azur, Bruno gets deeper and deeper into an intrigue, pursued by police and mafia.

programme.title: Wajma, An Afghan Love Story
programme.desc: In conservative Kabul, young Wajma discovers she is pregnant out of wedlock. Her boyfriend denies paternity and her father locks her up for being a disgrace. Driven by desperation, Wajma takes extreme measures forcing everyone to re-think their actions.

programme.title: Binti
programme.desc: Faced with potential deportation as an immigrant, Binti, a 12-year-old vlogger plots a scheme with her new friend to bring their parents together to save her future.

programme.title: Not Here To Be Loved
programme.desc: Jean-Claude is a disillusioned middle-age man who has long forgotten to smile. He is divorced, has a strained relationship with his only son and thinks his father never loved him. Then, he steps in to a tango school and meets Francoise and life changes.

programme.title: Hunt For The Bosses
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Duisburg Mafia Murders in 2007. Late night, Antonio Russo leaves his restaurant with his nephew and employees. Suddenly two gunmen appear and open fire. Investigations lead to a village in Italy from which all victims originate.

programme.title: Provocative - EP 50
programme.desc: Tess inches closer to uncovering the truth about Emily's connection to Pierce's poisoning. Clarissa's ruthless drive to secure her dream wedding venue pulls Venya into the mix, leading to a disastrous "accident".

programme.title: Leverage: Redemption S1 - EP 15
programme.desc: Reformed criminals put their unique skills to good use by helping regular citizens fight back against corporate and governmental injustices.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Dessert Masters S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: 10 of the country's elite pastry pioneers, chefs and chocolatiers will whisk it all in the Dessert Masters kitchen, each vying to become the competition's inaugural champion and win $100,000 in prize money.

programme.title: Beat Shazam USA S5 - EP 3
programme.desc: Beat Shazam is an interactive musical game show based on the Shazam app, in which teams compete against each other attempting to identify songs.

programme.title: Arts 21 - EP 393
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S41 - EP 7957
programme.desc: Pat Sajak hosts his final season of Wheel of Fortune.

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal Australia S12 - EP 128
programme.desc: The exhilarating hit game show where contestants must beat The Banker to win a huge cash prize, is making a triumphant return. The ultimate contest of nerve, luck and pure gut instinct will be fronted by one of Australia's most beloved TV presenters, Gold Logie winner Grant Denyer.

programme.title: The Great Canadian Baking Show Series 5 - EP 6
programme.desc: The best amateur bakers from across Canada compete in a series of themed culinary challenges that celebrate their diversity. Ten of the country's most passionate bakers go head-to-head in a series of tasks that celebrate their diverse backgrounds, families and communities. In each episode they'll face three nail-biting rounds, in a warm-spirited competition that celebrates personal achievement and the joy of baking.

programme.title: Supa Strikas - EP 55
programme.desc: Follow Shakes, Rasta and the rest of the Supa Strikas on their quest to become the world's greatest football team!

programme.title: Beyblade Burst Surge - EP 3
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) A legend of legends, Valt Aoi hosts an exhibition match featuring a revolutionary class of Bey: "Lightning Beys". Inspired by the battle, two unknown brothers, Hyuga and Hikaru Hizashi, issue a challenge: armed with their solar Beys Hyperion and Helios, this unlikely duo is going to topple Beyblade's ruling elite.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S10 - EP 1

programme.title: For The Birds
programme.desc: Irma is a tomboy who believes independence is the only form of freedom. Then she meets Sampie, a charming rugby player with a heart of gold and oh-so-soft hands who sweeps her right off her feet to the altar, but not before she teaches him a thing or two.

programme.title: Premiere Affaire
programme.desc: Nora, a young and an inexperienced criminal defense lawyer is charged with the case of a teenage boy accused of murdering a neighbour.

programme.title: Murders In Lorraine
programme.desc: A corpse clutching a crystal chess piece is found in an old fortress. Lieutenant Muller and a young female intern work on the case. Much to his horror, the clues lead him to his family-owned crystal factory – a legacy he abandoned for his police dream.

programme.title: Binti
programme.desc: Faced with potential deportation as an immigrant, Binti, a 12-year-old vlogger plots a scheme with her new friend to bring their parents together to save her future.

programme.title: Commitment Hasan
programme.desc: Farmer Hasan is at a crossroads between challenges and new opportunities. A high-voltage mast can end up in the middle of his fertile and cultivated land. But can this invasion of modernity be resolved now that the neighbouring plot is for sale?

programme.title: Wajma, An Afghan Love Story
programme.desc: In conservative Kabul, young Wajma discovers she is pregnant out of wedlock. Her boyfriend denies paternity and her father locks her up for being a disgrace. Driven by desperation, Wajma takes extreme measures forcing everyone to re-think their actions.

programme.title: For A Moment, Forever
programme.desc: A young popstar overwhelmed by fame meets a troubled ex-rocker teaching music to adolescents at a therapy centre. Both longing for love, they get closer as affection for music connects them, but shall they overcome the burdens of his past?

programme.title: Not Here To Be Loved
programme.desc: Jean-Claude is a disillusioned middle-age man who has long forgotten to smile. He is divorced, has a strained relationship with his only son and thinks his father never loved him. Then, he steps in to a tango school and meets Francoise and life changes.

programme.title: Murder in Kermadec
programme.desc: A man is found dead at the foot of a cliff in a small quiet fishing village. Captain Breguet who wanted to leave the region will have to stay a little longer to solve this crime. She will find a mysterious man on her way and fight to protect her daughter.

programme.title: Hunt For The Bosses
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Duisburg Mafia Murders in 2007. Late night, Antonio Russo leaves his restaurant with his nephew and employees. Suddenly two gunmen appear and open fire. Investigations lead to a village in Italy from which all victims originate.

programme.title: Domingo (2018)
programme.desc: The historic election of Brazilian president Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva is seen from the perspective of a provincial bourgeois family. His inauguration deeply troubles the family, as they worry about their authority and wealth in this new administration.

programme.title: Intimate Stranger
programme.desc: In post-COVID Tokyo, single mother Megumi is desperate to find her missing son Shinpei. After a shady young man claims to know her son’s whereabouts, he is invited into Megumi’s home where he soon uncovers a shocking secret.

programme.title: Khutulun: The Wrestling Princess
programme.desc: Princess Khutulun, a formidable Mongol warrior descended from Genghis Khan, has her marriage ambushed by an assassin who steals the Golden Sutra. Vowing revenge, Khutulun and her clan set out on an epic journey to retrieve the sacred text and restore peace.

programme.title: Gluttony
programme.desc: Sakshi, Varun, and Saif appear to be entangled in a simple love triangle, but beneath the affair lies a sinister secret. Sakshi’s affair with Saif hides deeper horrors, as dark secrets between her and Varun surface.

programme.title: A Summer in South Tyrol
programme.desc: When Franziska Gasser travels back to South Tyrol following her father’s car accident, sparks fly between her and Marco Antonelli. However, the long-standing rivalry between the Germans and Italians threatens to put an abrupt end to the blooming romance.
